import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; import '../css/Products.css'; import Table from 'react-bootstrap/Table'; import { saveProducts } from '../utils/Common'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; function AllProducts(props) { const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false); const [error, setError] = useState(null); const [products, setProducts] = useState([]); const [caid, setCaid] = useState(-1) useEffect(() => { setLoading(true); setCaid(props.match.params.caid); axios({ method: 'post', url: 'http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/productsbycategory/', data: { caid: props.match.params.caid } }).then( response => { //console.log(response.data) setProducts(response.data.products); console.log(response.data) saveProducts(response.data.products); setLoading(false); } ).catch( error => { setLoading(false); if (error.response.status === 401) setError(error.response.data.message); else setError("Something went wrong. Please try again later."); } ) }, []) //console.log(products); //const productsArray = JSON.parse(products); if(loading) { return(
Loading...

)) }
); } } export default AllProducts;
